name: VEGAPULS Air 23
description: The VEGAPULS Air 23 radar sensor is ideal for non-contact level measurement of almost all liquids and bulk solids. It can measure through the closed ceiling of the vessel, making it well-suited for use in IBCs and plastic containers. The rugged sensor housing with IP69 protection ensures reliable, maintenance-free operation even in outdoor environments or during cleaning processes.
author: Akenza AG
